DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Dose Regimen Oral Vitamin D 50,000 IU Treatment Vitamin D Deficiency
DOC.detailed_description: The study design prospective randomize double blind parallel design compare Vitamin D Placebo . This study conduct Jordan University Hospital ( JUH ) . The participant Healthy male females vitamin D deficiency ( 18 49 year old ) . All eligible male female agree participate study sign inform witnessed consent form begin study . The expected duration participant participation around 120 day number visit participant 6 visit divide follow ; first visit 7 day initiation trial ( screening period ) , second day zero treatment period , third day 30 , fourth day 60 , fifth day 90 sixth last visit day 104 ( 14 day last treatment ) . Therefore treatment period 90 day post treatment follow period 14 day .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subject willing able give voluntary inform consent participation study . Ethnic group ( Caucasian ) . Healthy male female age 18 49 year old . Normal weight ( BMI 18.525kg/m2 ) . Physical examination assess accepted attend physician . Systolic blood pressure within normal range ( 90140 ) mmHg . Diastolic blood pressure within normal range ( 6090 ) mmHg . Heart rate within normal range ( 60100 beats/min ) . Oral body temperature within normal range ( 35.9 37.6 CÂº ) . Diagnosed vitamin D deficiency 25OH Vitamin D level < 20ng/ml . All laboratory test include : Urine analysis , Hematology ( Hb , Packed Cell Volume , Red Blood Cell , Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin , Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin Concentration , Mea Corpuscular Volume , Leukocytes , Lymphocytes , Eosinophils , Basophils , Monocytes , Neutrophils , Platelet count ) , Kidney function test , Liver function test , Virology , Clinical chemistry , Ca , Mg , PO4 , PTH , Alkaline Phosphatase pregnancy test marry female , result within normal reference range . Able willing comply study requirement . Exclusion Criteria The subject may enter study ANY follow apply : Female subject pregnant , lactate plan pregnancy course study . Ethnic group non Caucasian . Males Females age < 18 > 49 year old . Underweight , overweight obese Females male Males Females diagnose diabetes , hypothyroidism , hyperthyroidism , liver disease , renal dysfunction , cardiovascular disease include hypertension , androgensecreting tumor , Cushing syndrome , congenital adrenal hyperplasia , hyperprolactinemia , and/or virilism . Known history presence food allergy intolerance ( e.g dairy product gluten contain food ) , know condition could interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism execration drug . History drug alcohol abuse , smoke 10 cigarette ( equivalent ) per day . Subjects take medication know affect metabolic parameter , metformin corticosteroid drug , vitamin D calcium .
